metricAlarms.AlarmDescription: This alarm is triggered when Cloud Trail configuration changes.
This alarm is triggered when Config configuration changes.
This alarm is triggered when Console Authentication failed.
This alarm is triggered when deletion Customer Managed key activity perform.
This alarm is triggered when IAM policy changes.
This alarm is triggered when root account is being used.

metricFilters.filterPattern: { ($.eventSource = s3.amazonaws.com) && (($.eventName = PutBucketAcl) || ($.eventName = PutBucketPolicy) || ($.eventName = PutBucketCors) || ($.eventName = PutBucketLifecycle) || ($.eventName = PutBucketReplication) || ($.eventName = DeleteBucketPolicy) || ($.eventName = DeleteBucketCors) || ($.eventName = DeleteBucketLifecycle) || ($.eventName = DeleteBucketReplication)) }
